professionalGoal.title: Professional Goal
professionalGoal.content: Continuously evolve as a full stack developer, deepening knowledge in software architecture and development best practices, while collaborating with teams to deliver real value to users.

skills.title: Skills

activities.title: Additional Activities
activities.content: In 2021 I was part of the Edutech project, which gave young people the opportunity to learn about website development.

info.title: Information
info.learning: I enjoy learning new things, all new knowledge is welcome
info.best: I always strive to do my best in everything I do

doAndBuild.name: Do And Build
doAndBuild.description: Productivity and organization website where users build and share folders!

features.auth: Complete registration/login system with Spring Security and JWT
features.folders: Creation of task/study folders as a roadmap
features.house: A house is built as you complete your tasks!

podpatoFrontend.name: PodPato (Front-end Version)
podpatoFrontend.description: Website to watch the best Youtube podcasts!

features.javascript: Extensive JavaScript for API control, resulting in a website with many podcast features

podpatoFullstack.name: PodPato (Front and Back)
podpatoFullstack.description: Everything the front-end only version delivers, but with account creation and login system, likes and comments system for each podcast with MongoDB database!

features.accounts: Account system with email and password, registration and login
features.mongodb: Application with MongoDB database, controlled through Mongoose
features.comments: Comments system that can be created, edited and deleted
features.savedHistory: Saved and History of podcasts together with the logged account

ticTacToe.name: Tic Tac Toe
ticTacToe.description: Tic Tac Toe game created using the React framework!

features.hooks: Uses Hooks provided by the framework (States and Effects)
features.choice: Players choose X or O before playing
features.restart: When the game ends, it can be restarted
